import React from "react"; import { Container } from "react-bootstrap"; import styled from "styled-components"; import { BsArrowLeftRight } from "react-icons/bs"; const Styles = styled.div` height: 45px; form { border-radius: 20px; } .btn-group .btn-secondary { background-color: #fff; border-color: #fff; color: #132968; font-weight: bold; } .col-1 { text-align: center; } .round-arrow button { border: 2px solid #4a536b; border-radius: 50%; width: 40px; height: 40px; background-color: #f0f0f0; } `; export const TravelForm = () => (
);
